title: Money Exchange: Making a Request (Usefulness 7)
description: Traveler usefulness 7/10 phrases for the Making a Request subcategory within Money Exchange. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: I'd like to change Canadian dollars into Australian dollars.
cards.romaji: Kanada doru wo Osutoraria doru ni kaetai desu.
cards.japanese: カナダドルをオーストラリアドルに替えたいです。
